snippet: Video of comments made on Friday by Iran’s president-elect, Hassan Rouhani, showed that he was misquoted by Iranian news agencies and had not called for the destruction of Israel.
abstract: Video of comments made on Friday by Iran’s president-elect, Hassan Rouhani, showed that he was misquoted by Iranian news agencies and had not called for the destruction of Israel.

headline.main: Video Shows Iran's President-Elect Was Misquoted on Israel
